subject: Broken red elastomers Plus X
description_text:
Hi I ordered a Plus X pedal set and when inspecting the red elastomers it seems like there are tears in it. This causes a weird creaking sound when installed. Switching to the yellow elastomers the sound is gone and the feel is more consistent. Attached below are pictures. Amazon Order #112-3002134-9839416 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Archit Kalla,  Here is the tracking number : SF6045998384986. You can track it via https://www.yunexpress.com/ or https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybillÂ
